Polycarbonate (PC) specs sheet

 

'Polycarbonates' ('PC'), known by the trademarked names Lexan, Makrolon,
Makroclear and others, are a particular group of thermoplastic polymers. They
are easily worked, molded, and thermoformed. Because of these properties,
polycarbonates find many applications. Polycarbonates do not have a unique resin
identification code and are identified as Other, 7.
headings: Companies that produce polycarbonate film & sheet and their brands
